Package xxl.core.io

Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Convertable The interface Convertable is a replacement for the SDK Externalizable interface because of its drawbacks.
FilesystemOperations This interface encapsulates the operations usually needed on a filesystem.
SizeAware Interface which has only one method which returns the size of the Object in main memory.
 

Class Summary
Block This class provides a block of serialized data.
BlockFactory This class provides a block factory, i.e. this class manages the allocation of blocks on an underlying byte array.
Buffer<O,I,E> This class provides a buffer for buffering I/Os in order to increase performance.
BufferedOutputStream This class wraps an output stream by writing whole blocks of buffered output bytes to the wrapped output stream.
BufferedRandomAccessFile This class provides a buffered random access file that reads and writes whole blocks of buffered bytes to and from the random access file.
ByteArrayConversions Conversion routines: byte array <--> short, int, long.
Convertables This class contains various methods connected to the serialization of convertable objects.
CounterDataInput Wraps a DataInput and counts the number of bytes which are read.
CounterInputStream This class provides a decorator for an input stream that counts the number of bytes that are read from the underlying stream.
CounterOutputStream This class provides a decorator for an output stream that counts the number of bytes that are written to the underlying stream.
DataInputInputStream This class wraps a DataInput to an InputStream.
DataOutputOutputStream This class which wraps a DataOutput to an OutputStream.
HeadOfDataInput Wraps a DataInput and returns only the first bytes of the DataInput.
InputStreams Some useful methods which use InputStreams (for example diff).
IOCounter This class provides a simple utility for counting I/Os.
IteratorInputStream This class provides an input stream that depends on a given iterator.
JavaFilesystemOperations This class implements the interface FilesystemOperations with normal Java method calls.
LinkedContainerBlocks This class contains some static methods which can be used to store objects in a chain of linked Block-objects inside a container.
LogFilesystemOperations This class logs all calls to a FilesystemOperations object.
LRUBuffer<O,I,E> This class provides a buffer with a LRU (least recently used) displacement strategy.
MultiBlockInputStream This class delivers an InputStream out of an Iterator which contains Blocks (created with ObjectToBlockIterator for example).
NullOutputStream This class provides an output stream pointing to a NULL sink, i.e., all output will be supressed.
ObjectToBlockCursor This class transforms objects into a sequence of Blocks.
RandomAccessFileInputStream This class provides a mechanism to read data via an InputStream from a RandomAccessFile.
RandomAccessFileOutputStream This class provides a mechanism to write Data via an OutputStream into a RandomAccessFile.
ReplaceOutputStream Filters an Output, so that some characters are replaces by other characters (or no characters).
XXLFilesystem Creates a simple raw device filesystem or connects to an existing filesystem.
 

Package xxl.core.io Description

Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system. An alternatively serialization mechanism is included by defining Converter and the Convertable interface. This allows the control over every byte which is stored in secondary memory. Last but not least, this package contains a Buffer implementation for the buffering of I/Os and a Block implementation for block based I/Os.
A larger bundle of buffered and unbuffered collections that uses external resources for storing their elements is included in the package

XXL - eXtensible and fleXible Library

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.

Questions or Bugs? Send us an Email: request@xxl-library.de
